nodes.text: The Tailfin Cantina was a pub operating in the town of Bartyn's Landing, on the planet of Lamaredd, as of 29 BBY. It was the property of Jerrahg, who also served as bartender.

The Tailfin Cantina was a popular drinking point. It was enjoyed both by visitors to the town, as it was strategically placed, and also by lum-drinking sailors who enjoyed private gambling tables, all the while with an interpreter of kloo horn providing entertainment.

Fistfights happened occasionally with little provocation, with one of them taking place in 29 BBY because of a drunk seven-foot Quarren. The situation included breaking of furniture, although the musician still played The Hutt Two-Step all the time.
